column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Whiskey was the main theme at this restaurant! Amazing menu full of options and great cocktails! Starters we chose were pulled pork hush puppies & spicy chicken and cheese dip...both were yummy! The main I chose was the 12 hour beef short rib..and oh my delicious! Melt in your mouth goodness! Came with onion straws
column3: and au gratin potato's! Had some kiddos with us
column4: no kids menu but they enjoyed the Mac n cheese and burger!
